product_name: adidas Terrex Swift R GTX Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: Don't let a wet forecast keep you from the trail. The nimble adidas Terrex Swift R GTX hiking shoes provide Gore-Tex(R) waterproof protection so you can hike through puddles in the pouring rain. High-abrasion mesh and synthetic leather uppers offer breathability and durability; waterproof and breathable Gore-Tex/nylon linings keep feet dry. Speed lacing construction for fast and snug lacing. EVA midsoles cushion each step; polyamide protection plates protect feet from uneven trail debris. The adidas Terrex Swift R GTX hiking shoes boast aggressive rubber outsoles for sure traction. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: Don't let a wet forecast keep you from the trail. The nimble adidas Terrex Swift R GTX hiking shoes provide Gore-Tex(R) waterproof protection so you can hike through puddles in the pouring rain.
